      Constructor and Description
      Manifest()
      This is the constructor of the class which initialised the trucks Arraylist for the order, creates a stock and orders the cargo list to have the lowest temp first

    • Uses of ItemDoesNotExistException in GUI

      Methods in GUI that throw ItemDoesNotExistException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Store.loadManifest(java.nio.file.Path file)
      Loads in the manifest ordered for the store, and with that updates the inventory accordingly (adding all of the items that were ordered) and updates the capital accordingly (decreases the capital by the cost of the order)
      void Store.loadSalesLog(java.nio.file.Path file)
      Loads in a sales log after the week, and with that updates the inventory accordingly (removing all of the items that were sold) and updates the capital accordingly (adds the store costs of every item sold)

    • Uses of ItemDoesNotExistException in Stock

      Methods in Stock that throw ItemDoesNotExistException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Stock.add(java.lang.String itemName, int quantity)
      This method is used to increase the quantity of an item held in the stock.
      int Stock.currentQuantity(java.lang.String item)
      This method allows a search for an item to see it's current quantity within the stock
      void Stock.discontinue(java.lang.String item)
      This method will remove an item from the stock.
      Item Stock.itemRetriever(java.lang.String itemName)
      This method retrieves the Item object from a string search.
      void Stock.remove(java.lang.String itemName, int quantity)
      This method is used to decrease the quantity of an item within the stock
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> Stock.reorder()
      This method searches the current inventory and works out whether there are any quantities that are below the reorder point for that associated item.
